about_the_game:
Double, double, tilt and tumble; Bread may burn, but cookies crumble.

Serve up a slice of late 2000's app store nostalgia with this short-but-sweet gravity-altering physics-based 2D ball-rolling game.

Our signature palm-sized dish is made with only the highest quality ingredients, including:

  • More than 50 hand-crafted tracks to roll conjured confectioneries through, with more entries constantly being added to the menu.

  • Grab-and-go bite-sized gameplay optimized to make the most out of that two-minute coffee break.

  • Tasty rewards and sweet styles to show off your culinary mastery. Can't have a millennial-era game without hats.

  • Kind of cute but striking art style that you won't be embarrassed to play in public, with tunes to match.

  • Special extra unlockable sweet treats for dessert, if you find yourself wanting just a teeny bit more.

The game tastes best when served with a device that has gyroscopic capabilities, but it is perfectly playable with touch or a standard mouse.

Our signature palm-sized dish is made with only the highest quality ingredients, including:

name: Crescent Roll

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (x64)
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 700 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Embedded should work.
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any that support MP3 streaming (most CPUs have this embedded)
  • VR Support: None
  • Additional Notes: Best with something that has a gyro, but works without it.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (x64)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any dedicated graphics card.
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: No additional specialized support for dedicated sound cards.
  • VR Support: None
  • Additional Notes: Physics calculations in later stages may be a bit taxing on older (pre-2015) devices.

short_description: Serve up a slice of late 2000's app store nostalgia with this short-but-sweet gravity-altering physics-based 2D ball-rolling game.
